comments:
Eclipse 3.3 : clipse-SDK-I20061214-0010-win32.zip
IBM JVM 1.5
TPTP from HEAD

Following exception is thrown when any of the following action is done 
- import trace
- launch trace

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.xerces.jaxp.SAXParserFactoryImpl incompatible with javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory
at javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.makeParser(XMLLoader.java:556)
at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.makeParser(SAXFragmentHandler.java:123)
at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.SAXFragmentHandler.scanContent(SAXFragmentHandler.java:429)
at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.loadEvents(XMLLoader.java:763)
at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.wizard.ImportTracePage1$3.run(ImportTracePage1.java:895)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)


When import log file, the following is also thrown: ---------

org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.LogParserException: IWAT0371E The adapter configuration file D:\ibm\dev-4.4\eclipse\runtime-New_configuration(1)\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers\GLA1167774740709.adapter cannot be parsed.  Exception = org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl incompatible with javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.getNewConfigFile(ParserWrapper.java:313)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.setUserInput(ParserWrapper.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.importer.LocalLogImportLoader.startParsing(LocalLogImportLoader.java:94)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.LocalImportHandler.importLog(LocalImportHandler.java:105)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.run(ImportLogWizard.java:1011)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Embedded exception follows:
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl incompatible with javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory
	at javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.getNewConfigFile(ParserWrapper.java:301)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.setUserInput(ParserWrapper.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.importer.LocalLogImportLoader.startParsing(LocalLogImportLoader.java:94)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.LocalImportHandler.importLog(LocalImportHandler.java:105)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.run(ImportLogWizard.java:1011)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

The fix is to move the org.eclipse.apache.xerces to the top of the Require-bundle list in META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.

The CVS doesn't work, I'll attach the file here until CVS connection is fixed.

Created an attachment (id=56421)
Fixed MANIFEST.MF file
*** Bug 169594 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I verified the patch fix the problem for the following report scenarios
- import log (local/remote)
- import profile file 
- profile launch (locale/remote)

Thanks Marius.
Import symptom db from WAS proprietary format fails for the same reason.

Created an attachment (id=56439)
Manifest file which is not working although has xerxes the first in the list of required bundles

The import sdb works with the manifest attached by Marius but not with this attachement.

Fix in CVS.

Alex your file has the Require-bundle before Export-packages my file has them in reverse order.

I'll notify the Eclipse platform about this problem.
Marius, please update the target milestone
